packages.name: Precipitation and Weather Monitor for NWS Data
packages.description:
This is another paragraph.

Gathers hourly precipitation and other weather data from your nearest airport and makes it available to you via a device driver for access via rules. No codes or API keys needed. Provides rolling 1,3,6,12,24 hr totals and up to 7 days of precipitation history. Also provides temperature, humidity, dewpoint, pressure, wind, weather, sky conditions and visibility data.
